issue.title: [CF 940] TellMeWhen_Options could not be loaded: Missing
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN YOUR TICKET BEING INVALIDATED.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Loading the UI
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I uh, expect it to load...

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.2.6

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
I stick the addond into the folder, load in, and i get "Loading TellMeWhen_Options could not be loaded: Missing" four times in a row. The only thing I can think of is that when I'm copying the files over, I get a notice that the folder already exists and it asks if I want to Copy and Replace etc. I've tried all three options and it still doesn't work. Thanks in advance!


> Posted by CurseForge user tanzorbarbarian | Imported from CurseForge issue #940 | Raw

comments.body:
Make sure you restart WoW after installing addons. Also make sure that both TellMeWhen and TellMeWhen_Options are present in your Interface/AddOns directory. If you are still having trouble after this, try installing using the Curse Client.

Apart from this, I can't offer much other advice because this is an issue with the way that you are installing your addons and not an issue with TellMeWhen itself.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
